item.title: Contact
item.description:
Get In Touch

I’m always interested in discussing DevSecOps, security automation, cloud architecture, or potential collaboration opportunities.

Let’s Connect

Email: yuveerchetraj@gmail.com

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/yuveer-chetraj-181a7716b/

GitHub: github.com/W0rldedit14

Medium: @thedevsecopshandbook

What I Can Help With

  • Consulting: DevSecOps implementation, security automation strategies
  • Speaking: Conference talks, workshops, webinars on DevSecOps topics
  • Collaboration: Open-source projects, security tool development
  • Mentoring: Career guidance for aspiring DevSecOps engineers
  • Writing: Technical articles, documentation reviews

Response Time

I typically respond to emails within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please reach out via LinkedIn.
